verses.verse: "I am inquired<WH1875> of by those who didn't<WH3808> ask;<WH7592> I am found<WH4672> by those who didn't<WH3808> seek<WH1245> me:<WH559> I said, See me,<WH1471> see me, to a nation that was not called<WH7121> by my name.<WH8034>

I have spread out<WH6566> my hands<WH3027> all the day<WH3117> to a rebellious<WH5637> people,<WH5971> who walk<WH1980> in a way<WH1870> that is not good,<WH2896> after<WH310> their own thoughts;<WH4284>
a people<WH5971> who provoke<WH3707> me to my face<WH6440> continually,<WH8548> sacrificing<WH2076> in gardens,<WH1593> and burning incense<WH6999> on bricks;<WH3843>

who sit<WH3427> among the graves,<WH6913> and lodge<WH3885> in the secret places;<WH5341> who eat<WH398> pig<WH2386>'s flesh,<WH1320> and broth<WH4839> of abominable<WH6292> things is in their vessels;<WH3627>

who say,<WH559> Stand<WH7126> by yourself,<WH5066> don't come near to me,<WH6942> for I am holier than you.<WH6227> These are a smoke in my nose,<WH639> a fire<WH784> that burns<WH3344> all the day.<WH3117>
"Behold,<WH3789> it is written before<WH6440> me:<WH2814> I will not keep silence, but will recompense,<WH7999> yes,<WH7999> I will recompense into their bosom,<WH2436>

your own iniquities,<WH5771> and the iniquities<WH5771> of your fathers<WH1> together,<WH3162>" says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> "who have burned incense<WH6999> on the mountains,<WH2022> and blasphemed<WH2778> me on the hills;<WH1389> therefore will I first<WH7223> measure<WH4058> their work<WH6468> into their bosom.<WH2436>"

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> "As the new wine<WH8492> is found<WH4672> in the cluster,<WH811> and one says,<WH559> <WH7843> 'Don't destroy it,<WH1293> for a blessing is in it:<WH6213>' so will I do for my servants<WH5650>' sake,<WH7843> that I may not destroy them all.

I will bring forth<WH3318> a seed<WH2233> out of Jacob,<WH3290> and out of Judah<WH3063> an inheritor<WH3423> of my mountains;<WH2022> and my chosen<WH972> shall inherit<WH3423> it,<WH5650> and my servants shall dwell there.<WH7931>
Sharon<WH8289> shall be a fold<WH5116> of flocks,<WH6629> and the valley<WH6010> of Achor<WH5911> a place for herds<WH1241> to lie down in,<WH7258> for my people<WH5971> who have sought me.<WH1875>

"But you who forsake<WH5800> Yahweh,<WH3068> who forget<WH7913> my holy<WH6944> mountain,<WH2022> who prepare<WH6186> a table<WH7979> for Fortune,<WH1409> and who fill<WH4390> up mixed wine<WH4469> to Destiny;<WH4507>

I will destine<WH4487> you to the sword,<WH2719> and you shall all bow down<WH3766> to the slaughter;<WH2874> because when I called,<WH7121> you didn't<WH6030> answer; when I spoke,<WH1696> you didn't<WH8085> listen; but you did<WH6213> that which was evil<WH7451> in my eyes,<WH5869> and chose<WH977> that in which I didn't<WH2654> delight."

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh,<WH3069> "Behold,<WH5650> my servants shall eat,<WH398> but you shall be hungry;<WH7456> behold,<WH5650> my servants shall drink,<WH8354> but you shall be thirsty;<WH6770> behold,<WH5650> my servants shall rejoice,<WH8055> but you shall be disappointed;<WH954>

behold,<WH5650> my servants shall sing<WH7442> for joy<WH2898> of heart,<WH3820> but you shall cry<WH6817> for sorrow<WH3511> of heart,<WH3820> and shall wail<WH3213> for anguish<WH7667> of spirit.<WH7307>

You shall leave<WH3240> your name<WH8034> for a curse<WH7621> to my chosen;<WH972> and the Lord<WH136> Yahweh<WH136> will kill<WH4191> you;<WH7121> and he will call his servants<WH5650> by another<WH312> name:<WH8034>

so that he who blesses<WH1288> himself in the earth<WH776> shall bless<WH1288> himself in the God<WH430> of truth;<WH543> and he who swears<WH7650> in the earth<WH776> shall swear<WH7650> by the God<WH430> of truth;<WH543> because the former<WH7223> troubles<WH6869> are forgotten,<WH7911> and because they are hidden<WH5641> from my eyes.<WH5869>
"For,<WH1254> behold, I create new<WH2319> heavens<WH8064> and a new<WH2319> earth;<WH776> and the former<WH7223> things shall not be remembered,<WH2142> nor come<WH5927> into mind.<WH3820>
But be you glad<WH7797> and rejoice<WH1523> forever<WH5703> in that which I create;<WH1254> for,<WH1254> behold, I create Jerusalem<WH3389> a rejoicing,<WH1525> and her people<WH5971> a joy.<WH4885>

I will rejoice<WH1523> in Jerusalem,<WH3389> and joy<WH7797> in my people;<WH5971> and there shall be heard<WH8085> in her no more the voice<WH6963> of weeping<WH1065> and the voice<WH6963> of crying.<WH2201>

"There shall be no more there an infant<WH5764> of days,<WH3117> nor an old man<WH2205> who has not filled<WH4390> his days;<WH3117> for the child<WH5288> shall die<WH4191> one hundred<WH3967> years<WH8141> old,<WH1121> and the sinner<WH2398> being one hundred<WH3967> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> shall be accursed.<WH7043>
They shall build<WH1129> houses,<WH1004> and inhabit<WH3427> them;<WH5193> and they shall plant vineyards,<WH3754> and eat<WH398> their fruit.<WH6529>

They shall not build,<WH1129> and another<WH312> inhabit;<WH3427> they shall not plant,<WH5193> and another<WH312> eat:<WH398> for as the days<WH3117> of a tree<WH6086> shall be the days<WH3117> of my people,<WH5971> and my chosen<WH972> shall long enjoy<WH1086> the work<WH4639> of their hands.<WH3027>

They shall not labor<WH3021> in vain,<WH7385> nor bring forth<WH3205> for calamity;<WH928> for they are the seed<WH2233> of the blessed<WH1288> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and their offspring with them.<WH6631>
It shall happen that,<WH7121> before they call, I will answer;<WH6030> and while they are yet speaking,<WH1696> I will hear.<WH8085>

The wolf<WH2061> and the lamb<WH2924> shall feed<WH7462> together,<WH259> and the lion<WH738> shall eat<WH398> straw<WH8401> like the ox;<WH1241> and dust<WH6083> shall be the serpent<WH5175>'s food.<WH3899> They shall not hurt<WH7489> nor destroy<WH7843> in all my holy<WH6944> mountain,<WH2022>" says<WH559> Yahweh.<WH3068>
